name: Prestige Services
description: Your family run local meals on wheels. We take the strain of food preparation on your behalf and serve delicious home cooked meals at reasonable prices. The food is delivered to your door hot or cold 6 days a week by one of our friendly team. All our deliveries are non-contact, as well as free of charge, and our menu alternates every week. We deliver to Deal, Walmer, Sandwich and Dover.
